sentences.sContent: When the unicorn saw the number stuck to my side, it started bouncing up and down in excitement.
sentences.sContent_eng: When the unicorn saw the number stuck to my side, it started bouncing up and down in excitement.
sentences.sCn: 当这只独角兽看见贴在我侧面的数字时，它开始兴奋地跳上跳下。

sentences.sContent: Opening image: A glorious well-oiled angel riding on a winged unicorn. Sure, it's sexy. But too sexy?
sentences.sContent_eng: Opening image: A glorious well-oiled angel riding on a winged unicorn. Sure, it's sexy. But too sexy?
sentences.sCn: 开场图片：一个辉煌的醉酒天使骑在长翅膀的独角兽上。当然，它性感。但是很性感么？

sentences.sContent: Opening image: A glorious well-oiled angel riding on a winged unicorn.
sentences.sContent_eng: Opening image: A glorious well-oiled angel riding on a winged unicorn.
sentences.sCn: 开场图片：一个辉煌的醉酒天使骑在长翅膀的独角兽上。

trans.tranOther: an imaginary animal like a white horse with a long straight horn growing on its head
